next_action: COMPLETE: guiServer.js 8248→2612 LOC (68% reduction). Extracted: requestHelpers.js (852 LOC — 60+ utility functions); indexlabDataBuilders.js (2468 LOC — 22 data-building functions with module-level init pattern); 10 route handler modules (infraRoutes, configRoutes, indexlabRoutes, catalogRoutes, brandRoutes, studioRoutes, reviewRoutes, testModeRoutes, queueBillingLearningRoutes, sourceStrategyRoutes). handleApi() reduced to 36-line thin dispatch. 0 regressions; 2443 tests pass.
audit_basis: Monolith decomposition Phase 1 — guiServer.js was the largest monolith (8248 LOC) with 15+ domain imports and one massive handleApi() if/else chain.

next_action: COMPLETE: IndexingPage.tsx 10291→4209 LOC (59% reduction). Extracted: types.ts (874 LOC — all interfaces); helpers.tsx (476 LOC — 40+ utility functions + 2 React components); 19 panel components in panels/ directory (5770 LOC total). Each panel receives data as props from parent. Panel-specific state (sort keys; search queries; selected traces) moved into panel components. TypeScript 0 errors; Vite build clean. 0 regressions.
audit_basis: Monolith decomposition Phase 3 — IndexingPage.tsx was the largest GUI monolith (10291 LOC) with 17 panels inline.
